text: The Oldsmobile Bravada is a luxury Sports Utility Vehicle (SUV), manufactured by Oldsmobile from 1990 until the company's discontinuation in 2004. It is related to the Chevrolet Blazer and the GMC Jimmy. == Other websites == * Oldsmobile's Official Website Category:Sport utility vehicles Category:Oldsmobile automobiles Category:1990s automobiles Category:2000s automobiles
title: Oldsmobile Bravada
